ingredients.content: 100 g pecorino cheese, cut in pieces (3 cm)
500 g fresh oyster mushrooms, cut in pieces
2 tsp fine sea salt, plus extra for seasoning
½ tsp ground black pepper, plus extra for seasoning
800 g courgettes, in thin strips (similar to ribbon noodles, see tip)

preparations.content: Place pecorino in mixing bowl and grate <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions and garlic in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then add olive oil and sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add carrots and celery then chop <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>.

Add mushrooms, tomatoes, tomato purée, bay leaves, rosemary, thyme, paprika, sugar, salt and pepper. Place Varoma dish into position then weigh in courgettes, ensuring some holes remain unobstructed for steam to circulate. Steam <b>20 min/Varoma//speed 1<b>.
Set Varoma aside. Remove rosemary, thyme and bay leaves from bolognese then season to taste.
Divide steamed courgette noodles between 4 bowls, ladle bolognese over each and sprinkle with reserved grated pecorino. Serve immediately.
